Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Pectoral with a Small Coptic Cross
Description: Jewelry was made of a great variety of materials: bone, metals, wood, semi-precious stones and beads. This long pectoral is made of beads of different colors. The beads are small at the ends and increase in size towards the middle, where a small Coptic cross is suspended
